features: Eliminate annoying screen glare with up to 15º of effortless tilt. No tools required.
The low-profile design securely holds your TV only 2.5" from the wall, while still giving you easy access to cables.
DIY in no time. Our easy to follow instructions and simple 3-step install process makes mounting your TV on 16" or 24" wood studs a breeze.
Our durable steel mounts are designed to accommodate almost any VESA pattern & TVs up to 70". They come with an extensive hardware packet to ensure compatibility.
We're here for you. ECHOGEAR TV mount experts are available 7 days a week to help you finish your project and have a great weekend.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have you had enough of that blinding glare on your TV? Let’s face it, we’ve all been there… Time to upgrade with the Echogear Tilting TV Wall Mount! Say Goodbye To Screen Glare Built with tilting brackets, our mount allows you to angle your TV screen as far as 15 degrees, removing reflections from ambient lighting, windows, and even the Christmas lights across the street your neighbor refuses to take down. The Ultimate Fireplace TV Mount Mounting above a fireplace? A titling mount is the best possible solution! Because you are mounting above eye level, slanting the screen down allows you to get the best possible views. Low Profile For A Clean Setup This low-profile design holds your TV tight to the wall for a clean look, but with the tilt you can still hide unwanted cables and cords from view or gain access at any time. This is extremely important as we know you’ll be hooking up to an N64 for weekly Mario Kart parties. Still not sure if this Echogear Tilting Wall Mount is for you? This mount will get the job done if you want to: Mount your TV closer to the wall Reduce glare from lights and windowsMMount above eye level (like above a fireplace)Be safer around kids, pets, and drunk friends If you need a full motion TV mount that can extend and swivel, see the Echogear compare chart below. We've got em' all. When you buy with Echogear, you don't just get an awesome product at a great value, but a ton of extras that cheap knock-off mount sellers can't touch. Installing our mount is as easy as it gets. In 3 steps and under 30 minutes your gorgeous flat-screen will be on the wall. Our install manual is awesome and even has some jokes. If you run into a snag we've got US-based pros standing by to answer your calls 7 days a week. At Echogear, we've got your back.

Go Full Tilt Features effortless 15 degree tilt capability. Eliminate glare from lights and windows by tilting the screen, so you can see Chris Hemsworth's abs better. That's a big win for everyone. Release The Tension With the easy to use tension knob, you can lock the TV in the perfect tilted position. It'll keep your screen stable without the wobble. You've Really Slimmed Down Maximize your thin TV's chic look with a low profile mount. Our design is so slim, no one will see it, like the new Ghostbusters movie.

Original Tilting Mount Upgraded Tilting Mount Tilt Style Tension Knob Easy Fingertip Tilt TV Size Up To 75" Up To 90" Center On Wall Yes Yup Level After Mounting You Know It Install Wall Template Yessir Pull String Removal You Better Believe It Wall Plate Width 24" 26" for a lil extra space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy product and easy install
reviews.reviewText: The installation instructions that come with this mount are worth the price of the kit alone. The product is great but the installation instructions are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to hold a 48" LG OLED Monitor. I didn't want it to rotate out, so this is only tilt up & down. Was easy to mount and came with everything I needed to get the job done. Great Product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV mount!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and great price! Don’t pay Best Buy 3x the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2015
reviews.reviewText: I searched a long time before I purchased this item. I selected it because it appeared (based off reviews) to be well constructed and had a larger wall mount so it would be more versatile in terms of where you could hang it. A larger mount will allow for wider range when dealing with stud placement and hanging.Ultimately this is a good product, but I will first highlight the two issues I had with it:1) I mounted the wall bracket completely level on the wall (see attached photo) but when I attached the TV with the other part of the bracket it was not - it was uneven. I imagine it was a result of one of the attachment pieces (the hook portions that attach to the back of the TV) not being manufactured correctly or defective. I solved it by building a small wedge out of masking tape and placing it between the two pieces (the hook and the wall bracket). So, my TV sits perfectly level now but it would not have without making a modification.2) The second problem was my wall. I mounted two of the screws into a stud (on the left side) but I could not on the right side due to the spacing in my building. I went to the hard wear store and bough 4 additional screws and mounted the bracket with 8 total. 2 into a stud and 6 into the plaster. The bracket was solid as a rock afterwards. I would suggest that the manufacturer include a few extra screws but this may have been done specially for liability purposes and weight claims.The good things about this item:1) The instructions are SUPER clear and intuitive.2) I are a ton of parts to allow of different screw depths and configurations/set ups on the back of TVs. I cannot imagine needing more stuff than provided.3) If everything goes right, this is a very quick set up. I hit snags as described above, but had it not been for those issues the TV would have been up in under 30 minutes. It took me 4 hours total for reference (including trip to hardware store).4) It's sturdy, appears to be durable and well-made.5) It looks good. The product itself looks good (even though you can't see it). And the spacing between the TV and the wall is perfect.6) Complimentary USB cable was a very nice touch.7) Shipping was FAST. I got mine in two days using standard.Overall, it worked out for me, but the process did have a few hiccups. I would recommend this item if you are looking for a wall mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: This might be the best set of instructions and packaging I’ve ever seen. Extremely easy to install with a drill and a few basic tools, and the instructions are both humorous and very easy to follow.The build quality is also excellent—everything is sturdy and looks great, even if you can’t see it behind the TV. I would highly recommend this product and will buy another Echogear mount for my next (bigger) TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a great product! The thing is heavy duty and could ...
reviews.reviewText: It is a great product! The thing is heavy duty and could hold a big heavy tv even. My tv is a Samsung 32 inch and I wanted a wall mount for my tv that would last a long time, that was also high quality, and that wouldn't stick out behind my tv when it was on the wall. I also wanted something that was easy to install and at a good price with hopefully free shipping. This ECHOGEAR fit the bill perfectly, and out of all the wall mounts I looked at on amazon and walmart.com, I chose this one and it didn't disappoint me at all. It came quickly in the mail, it was a great deal at $35, and it qualified for free shipping. When I opened the box, it is a very nice wall mount, exactly as described and comes with a free hdmi cord- which I'm not that worried about but it was a nice freebie. I had 24 inch studs, and it fit perfectly just as described. It was so easy to install, the instructions were simple so there was no confusion or twenty pieces to assemble like some of the other wall mounts I've seen on here come in like twelve pieces and the metal is flimsy. This wall mount by ECHOGEAR is so worth the price, so thank you very much ECHOGEAR for making this great product and pricing it so well. I'm so glad I decided to go with this product instead of the others. I don't doubt it will last me for many many years, and it has a five year warranty on it! One caveat, if you want an ultra low profile wall mount, this comes pretty close but it's not ultra low profile, you can get your hand behind the tv comfortably to tilt the tv which I like about this, so keep in mind to figure out whether you want to sacrifice hand space behind the tv so you can have an ultra low profile wall mount-which are nice but they have no hand space, and remember to add the width of your tv to ECHOGEARS profile, mine comes out about 5 inches when we added the wall mount profile-which is about 1.9- 2.9 inches, and my tv is about 2.5 inches thick, so it sticks out about five inches in total and I can get my hand just comfortably behind the tv to tilt it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV mount, super easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Needed to hang a TV in our basement and found this mount from Amazon. Couldn't have been easier to install and the instructions are pretty amusing. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this one.
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, easy to follow instructions, easy to install. The only thing I needed help with was my husband had the had the tv up to me so I could hang it on the base. I had to get on a chair first. #shortgirlproblems

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid, quality tv mount at a decent price.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this tv mount for my LG 55” C1 OLED which is quite heavy. Installation was relatively straightforward and Echogear offers all required parts and excellent support. I would recommend and have ordered their AV stand for the receiver.

reviews.reviewTitle: This was an excellent product for the price
reviews.reviewText: This was an excellent product for the price. In stores, the only other racks i could find were $60-$70 and they didn't include the tilting movement this one did. It was easy enough to install with the instructions included, and all of the parts worked accordingly. I found it was also a very sturdy wall mount which easily held a 50" samsung tv above our fireplace and had no issues when mounting it. I would definitely recommend and purchase again.

Great mount. Comes with everything you need for a super easy install. Bought one for my 58” Samsung, then bought another one a couple years later for my 55” Samsung. Really solid and easy to hang the TV.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mount, but additional hardware may be required
reviews.reviewText: The unit is well built and solid, but I did run into a few installation issues. The hardware that the ECHOGEAR comes with can probably fit a wide range of different TV's, but unfortunately it did not fit the new Vizio that I had also just purchased (D43-D1). This Visio requires M6 sized screws, but the ECHOGEAR only came with 12mm and 33mm. The 12mm were to short, and the 33mm were too long. Even when I tried to use the spacers, the 33mm were then a bit too short. Compounding matters is that their support number does not work from Canada (really!?). All that said, a quick trip the hardware store, and 4 M6X20mm later and the TV was properly mounted.ECHO - it may be time to upgrade the screw sizes in your package to meet some of the new high volume sets being sold in 2017.
I like the mount kit comes with all sizes of screws and spacers so it was guaranteed to fit my new TV. It is strong, easy to adjust and easy to install. Very happy.
